description: Air quality labeling based on PM2.5 and Temperature

columns.name: Time
columns.description: Time of day in hours (extracted from HH:MM format)

prompt_template:
Context: I am using Janus-SWI to call Prolog from Python. I need to label rows of data. 

 The Rules:
{input_rules} 

 The Goal: Analyze the rules and write a Prolog predicate named pm_label that takes PM2.5, Temp, and Time as input (if there are other inputs, append them) and returns a label as a variable. (return only code without description and markdown, also 1 line per rule)

 Requirements: 
 Use standard SWI-Prolog syntax.
